item.title: Instant Production-Ready Scaffolding With Create-Static-Site
item.description: Create React App is a utility provided by the Facebook team in support of the React JavaScript framework. The goal of Create React App is to allow developers to quickly bootstrap a React project without having to spend time sorting out the build pipeline. With over 47,000 stars on Github (over half as many as the actual React library,) Create React App’s popularity speaks for itself. The success and utility of Create React App has inspired the Forestry.
